name: @ictu/gros-agent-config
description: Web interface for status and configuration of the data gathering agent
author: Leon Helwerda <l.s.helwerda@liacs.leidenuniv.nl>

scripts.watch: cross-env NODE_ENV=dev-sync nodemon -e js,json,mustache,yml --watch lib --watch template lib/index.js
scripts.test: rm -rf test-config test-export test-ssh && mkdir -p test-report/junit test-report/html test-config test-export test-ssh && echo 'test-dev' > test-config/VERSION && cross-env NODE_ENV=development CONFIG_PATH=test-config EXPORT_PATH=test-export IDENTITY_PATH=test-ssh nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text mocha --reporter=mocha-multi-reporters --reporter-options configFile=test-config.json tests/*.js tests/**/*.js
